attributes.additional_details: Why is it if you get in your car drunk and then drive and cause a death you get it easier than a person who commits a murder! It's the same if not worse when you get in that car drunk your excepting that you don't care who and it does matter that the person you kill is innocent, also you willing to kill any and however many people. Sign this petition to get the law changed, killing someone when drink driver should be treated and sentenced the same as a murderer.
